Reviews.Content: Yoga surfing yum I know from the moment I walked through the door and into the villas of best of both I was at the right place.Terergy here is so amazing and Dez you radiate that peaceful laid back energy.I did exactly what I wanted to do with my surfing I became more conident in getting onto bigger waves, went to reef a couple of times and it challenged me to become a better surfer.I will never forget the lessons I learnt, Michele you are such an amazing yogi, from the calming energy that surrounds you, to yourvast knowledge of yoga and your sense of humor.Ireally enjoyed your classes and they tought me a of things. I will take home with me.The food was fabulous, the accommoations perfict, I really felt at home here.I am so excited about the new friends that I met and hope to see them all here again because I am definitely coming backBetty
Reviews.Author: CalTriping

Reviews.Content: Surf and Yoga Retreat Just returned from a Best of Both Surf and Yoga adventure trip in PR. It was amazing the best tropical surf and yoga in the world. The villas arecharming and inviting and after our daily surf, we experience the laid back island living in a luxurious settings just like they said.The private chefs prepare meals for us 3 times a day with local organic produce and a menu that is out of this world. Thank you ,Thank you, Thank youIm booking for next year
